> The projects should be numbered consecutively (i.e., in the order in which you began them), and should include for each project a description of the goal, the product (computer program, hand graph, computer graph, etc.), the data, and some interpretation. Reports must be reproducible and of high quality in terms of writing, grammar, presentation, etc.

```{r load-packages, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse) 
library(tidyr)

```



```{r getdata}

ideal_society <- read.csv("C:\\Users\\Ben\\OneDrive\\Documents\\RRRPILOT_IdealSocietiesConservative Values_February 10, 2025_07.27.csv")

```


Changing the format of the StartDate variable to POSIX
```{r cleaningdata_1}
ideal_society$StartDate <- as.POSIXct(ideal_society$StartDate, format="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S", tz="UTC")

```


Filtering out responses that were not collected through Prolific.These were tests of the survey that qualtrics includes in the final data export.
``` {r cleaningdata_2}

ideal_society_real_data <- ideal_society %>%
  filter(as.Date(StartDate)=="2025-01-28") %>%
  filter(Progress != 14)
  
```

Removing one response from the data because their free response was not thoughtful enough. They just wrote "5" for our question asking what they would like to see happen in washington.

```{r cleaningdata_3}
ideal_society_clean <- ideal_society_real_data %>%
  filter(Q127 != 5)
```

```{r plot_duration}

ideal_society_clean <- ideal_society_clean %>%
  mutate(Duration..in.seconds. = as.numeric(Duration..in.seconds.))

ggplot(ideal_society_clean, aes(x = Duration..in.seconds.)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 20, fill = "blue", color = "black") +
  labs(title = "Distribution of Duration", x = "Duration (seconds)", y = "Frequency") +
  theme_minimal()



```

```{r poli_ori_duration_corr}

ideal_society_clean <- ideal_society_clean %>%
  mutate(Q2 = as.numeric(Q2))

ggplot(ideal_society_clean, aes(x = Q2, y = Duration..in.seconds.)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.6, color = "blue") +  
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = TRUE, color = "red") + 
  labs(title = "Correlation Between Political Orientation and Duration to Complete Survey",
       x = "Political Orientation (1 liberal-11 conservative)", y = "Duration (seconds)") +
  theme_minimal()
  
```





```{r}

cor(ideal_society_clean$Duration..in.seconds.,ideal_society_clean$Q2)

```
